numlitem.para: Aircraft remains at or below FL350, and
Flight remains within 60 minutes of landing at a suitable airport.

note.para: With one pack inoperative, limit altitude to FL350 or below.

With an air conditioning pack inoperative or OFF, isolation valve closed, and anti-ice OFF, a BLEED OFF Light may illuminate during takeoff power application. Under these conditions, the PRSOV is regulating air pressure to a point where the valve angle is small enough to activate the light switch. As engine power, and thus air pressure, is reduced the valve angle opens slightly and the BLEED OFF Light extinguishes.

numlitem.para: Limit flight altitude to FL350 or below.
Flight remains within 60 minutes of landing at a suitable airport.

placard.para: Placard respective Pack Control Selector "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
